summary:
This is a modification of the Fine Hat model. It turns the floppy part to the back and adds a tiny bit of detail in places.
It also makes the hat into a circlet slot so hair still shows underneath.
Other colors are craftable at Tanning Rack, and should show up in vendors.
descriptionHtml:
Festive Fine Hat Replacer
Dec 2017

This is a modification of the Fine Hat model. It turns the floppy part to the back and adds a tiny bit of detail in places.
It also makes the hat into a circlet slot so hair still shows underneath.
The size is increased quite a bit, so it might look odd on some players, particularly ones without a lot of hair.
Other colors are craftable at Tanning Rack, and should show up in vendors.


INSTALL:
Place files in Skyrim's Data folder

~nikita
author: Nikikuriton
